TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed BuildMethod extends System.MulticastDelegate

Docs.summary: Represents the method that is used to build a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The BuildMethod delegate passes the information that is required to build ASP.NET server controls. The information is defined by the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl> class or a class that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl> class.
